function_declarations.name: run_shell_command
function_declarations.description: Executes a shell command within a secure, sandboxed environment confined to the project's repository directory. Destructive commands (e.g., 'rm -rf /') and commands attempting to exit the sandbox are strictly forbidden and will fail.

command.description: The shell command to execute. Must be non-interactive.

function_declarations.name: write_file
function_declarations.description: Writes or overwrites content to a file. The file path must be within the project repository. The operation will fail if the file size exceeds 5MB.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file, relative to the project root.
